argumentText:
ARGUMENT
b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hsmexlem7.h | |- H = ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> ( har ` ~P ( X X. z ) ) ) , ( har ` ~P X ) ) |` _om ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_xpeq2 | |- ( b = z -> ( X X. b ) = ( X X. z ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_pweqd | |- ( b = z -> ~P ( X X. b ) = ~P ( X X. z ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( b = z -> ( har ` ~P ( X X. b ) ) = ( har ` ~P ( X X. z ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_xpeq2 | |- ( b = ( H ` a ) -> ( X X. b ) = ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_pweqd | |- ( b = ( H ` a ) -> ~P ( X X. b ) = ~P ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( b = ( H ` a ) -> ( har ` ~P ( X X. b ) ) = ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 5, 8 | #P_frsucmpt2 | |- ( ( a e. _om /\ ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) e. _V ) -> ( H ` suc a ) = ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( a e. _om -> ( H ` suc a ) = ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` a ) ) ) ) |
